page.title: 12Children's Games,Snape,Yorks
page.content: There are many different kinds of games which children play today. The most popular are chasing games like Chain Tig, Links and Grids. Any number of children can play the game called Grids. One child is chosen to chase after and try to catch all the other children. The other children run all around the playground and try to avoid being caught. If they stand on a specially marked grid in the playground, then they are safe and cannot be caught. Other popular games include skipping, playing with balls, running races, hopscotch and playing with toy cars and dolls.
